content.question: In lines 5-6 (in admirationem . . . facinus esse), we learn that

choices.label: Cocles and Mucius were insufficiently admired for their bravery
Cloelia’s bravery surpassed even that of other Roman heroes
people like Cocles and Mucius could learn from Cloelia’s actions
one should not compare the bravery of women with that of men

content.answer: Cloelia’s bravery surpassed even that of other Roman heroes
